query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.result: 13 Yasmin, yadi śrutāḥ syuḥ tasya prārthanāḥ, 14 Tava jñātaṃ syāt pratikāraḥ 15 Yaṃ drakṣyasi pūrvaṃ mṛtyoḥ."

query.prompt:

16 La spada di qua sù non taglia in fretta 17 né tardo, ma’ ch’al parer di colui 18 che disïando o temendo l’aspetta.
